thread.title: Facebook Outlines New Measures to Combat Racist and Xenophobic Content
thread.title_full: Facebook Outlines New Measures to Combat Racist and Xenophobic Content - WSJ

author: Ruth Bender
title: Facebook Outlines New Measures to Combat Racist and Xenophobic Content
text:
Facebook Inc. has announced new measures to fight xenophobic and racist messages on its platform, bending to pressure from the German government to clamp down on hate messages against migrants online.
The social network on Monday said it would set up a partnership with a German company that evaluates whether inappropriate content flagged by people falls under freedom of speech or is illegal under German law. The company also said it...
